COMMENT_TX: $Ron Swoboda dove and the ball caromed off his glove to Rusty Staub

Debut game for Rich Hacker

ej,gibsb101,P,burkk101,Bench jockeying $37 minute delay due to power failure; Bob Gibson ejected by HP umpire Ken Burkhart for leaving the bench and shouting at the umpires
$only last 2 balls intentional
$Glenn Beckert injured sliding home
Jose Pagan left with fractured arm

ej,virdb101,C,weyel901,Complaining about warning ej,granj101,P,weyel901,Complaining about warning $Pirates coach Virdon and Pirate Grant, not in game, ejected by HP umpire Weyer after complaining about warning issued to pitcher Kison after brushback pitch to Fairey

ej,alstw101,M,dalej901,Call at HP $Dodgers Manager Walter Alston argued with HP umpire Jerry Dale about the call at HP; Dale was blocked on the tag and Alston wanted Dale to talk with 1B umpire Augie Donatelli; Alston ejected by Dale
$dust blew into Willie Davis' eyes; he stepped out and asked for time; the pitch was called strike three
Ron Woods left with injured hamstring
$Debut game for Rimp Lanier
ej,maucg101,M,gormt101,Condition of field $Expos manager Mauch ejected by HP umpire Gorman for arguing game should be stopped for rain
Juan Pizarro hurt covering 1B
$Bill Bonham called for interference with catcher
